settings.richtext:
• Breathable Base: Designed for comfort even in hot weather or during workouts, no irritation or rashes to worry about.
  • Swiss Lace: Expertly hand-stitched for a refined shape, offering a soft texture and the most natural-looking hairline.
  • Premium Quality: Crafted from 100% Indian Remy human hair silky, durable, and long-lasting, with a replacement period of around 4–6 months.

settings.title: Shipping & Returns
settings.content:
Shipping

  • US Ground  5-7 Business days  $14.99 (Free with your purchase over $179) 
  • International  7-10 Business days  $29.89 (Free with your purchase over $249)

*Please note that international shipping cannot be upgraded.
*Business days refer to Monday to Friday

Wholesale Accounts

The shipping charge for bulk wholesale orders is $30 for 1 piece, plus $3 for each additional.

Returns

Returns and exchanges are accepted within 45 days from the delivery date. We offer three return options for you to choose from.

*conditions applied

If you have any questions or concerns, please contact us anytime.

See our Shipping Policy & Return Policy for more details.

settings.title: Natural-looking front hairline
settings.text: Helios has a base made entirely of transparent Swiss lace, The swiss lace is soft and will offer you the most natural-looking front hairline.

settings.title: Made from Indian Remy Human hair
settings.text: Indian Remy Human hair, which is in super fine quality and soft yet strong, it ensures you a 4-6 months replacement period.

settings.title: Breathable base
settings.text: No need to worry about any itching situation or getting rashes. With breathable base your scalp will be able to breatg while exercising in a gym or outdoors.
